suppress.notes: Vulnerability introduced by org.apache.jena:jena-fuseki-main, not fixed yet in <= 4.7.0
Requires org.keycloak/keycloak-admin-client > 21.0.2 (not released at the moment of adding this comment)
Requires com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-yaml to migrate to snakeyaml 2.0 Will be fixed in version >= 2.15
